overview:
Introduction

Sichermove.com is a product of Menora Software (P) Ltd. Established in India in November 2010. The origin of Menora is from UK. Menora is an IT company established in 2006 based in the United Kingdom. We are also an independent company which is not linked to any estate agents or builders. We are going to launch three online portals in Indian market and Sichermove.com is our first venture. Sichermove is a combination of German and English word. In German Sicher mean 100% sure. The portal provides you 100% information about the property not leaving even a single stone unturned.

Vision To become World Leader in providing the best online property services to our clients.

Mission Our main mission is to introduce India’s humungous & vast developing property market to all people both within India and outside India, and to approach all people through our unique property newspaper and the website. All we will do is to bring the buyer and seller together on the same platform. The seller will have total control of his property.
